sections.title: Testing Directory
sections.content: The `05-testing` directory contains documents related to testing strategies, test implementations, quality assurance, and testing best practices. This directory focuses on ensuring the quality and reliability of the system through effective testing.

sections.title: Purpose
sections.content: This directory serves as a central location for testing-related information. The documents here define testing strategies, explain test implementations, and provide guidance on quality assurance practices. This directory is valuable for developers implementing tests and for understanding the quality assurance process.

sections.title: Key Documents
sections.content:
- **consolidated-test-strategy.json**: Comprehensive document covering all testing strategies
- **e2e-test-implementation.json**: Implementation details for end-to-end tests
- **integration-test-details.json**: Details of integration testing approach

Additional documents include:
- Test patterns and best practices
- Test coverage requirements
- QA processes and workflows

sections.title: Related Tags
sections.content:
Common tags for documents in this directory include:
- testing
- test
- integration-test
- qa
- tdd
- e2e
